data.reviewDesc: This email is to confirm that you have enabled Log In with PayPal on your Braintree Sandbox user account.Your Braintree Sandbox username and password are no longer valid.
If you did not make this change, have questions, or suspect illegal attempts to access your account, please contact us.
That's great, because now when you pay with PayPal on this device, you'll skip login and can breeze through checkout on eligible apps and merchant websites
